casename: Public Prosecutor v Tan Chee Wee
counsel: Hay Hung Chun, Shirani Alfreds and Jane Tan (Attorney-General's Chambers) for the prosecution; Wee Pan Lee (Wee Tay & Lim) [briefed] and Teo Choo Kee (CK Teo & Co) [assigned] for the accused
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Murder/Defences/Self defence/The victim grabbed the knife used by the accused and looked threateningly at the accused/Whether the accused was acting in self defence.
Criminal Law/Murder/Defences/Sudden fight/The victim struggled with the accused during the robbery- Whether the circumstances amount to the defence of sudden fight.
